001package de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.generator;
002
003import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.booleanObjects;
004import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.booleans;
005import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.byteObjects;
006import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.bytes;
007import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.characterObjects;
008import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.characters;
009import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.classTypes;
010import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.dates;
011import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.doubleObjects;
012import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.doubles;
013import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.floatObjects;
014import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.floats;
015import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.integerObjects;
016import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.integers;
017import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.letterStrings;
018import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.localDateTimes;
019import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.localDates;
020import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.localTimes;
021import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.locales;
022import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.longObjects;
023import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.longs;
024import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.nonEmptyStrings;
025import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.numbers;
026import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.runtimeExceptions;
027import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.serializables;
028import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.shortObjects;
029import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.shorts;
030import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.temporals;
031import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.throwables;
032import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.timeZones;
033import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.urls;
034import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.zoneIds;
035import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.zoneOffsets;
036import static de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators.zonedDateTimes;
037import static de.cuioss.tools.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
038import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionLiterals.immutableList;
039import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.nullToEmpty;
040
041import java.io.Serializable;
042import java.net.URL;
043import java.time.LocalDate;
044import java.time.LocalDateTime;
045import java.time.LocalTime;
046import java.time.ZoneId;
047import java.time.ZoneOffset;
048import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
049import java.time.temporal.Temporal;
050import java.util.ArrayList;
051import java.util.Date;
052import java.util.List;
053import java.util.Locale;
054import java.util.TimeZone;
055
056import de.cuioss.test.generator.TypedGenerator;
057import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.PropertyMetadata;
058import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.impl.PropertyMetadataImpl;
059import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.impl.PropertyMetadataImpl.PropertyMetadataBuilder;
060import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.util.CollectionType;
061
062/**
063 * Factory for creating instances {@link PropertyMetadata} for standard
064 * java-types and primitives.
065 * <p>
066 * Usually it is used with the {@link #metadata(String)} method that will create
067 * concrete instances. In case you want to to further configure the result you
068 * can access the corresponding builder with {@link #metadataBuilder(String)}
069 * </p>
070 *
071 * @author Oliver Wolff
072 * @param <T> identifying the type to be generated
073 */
074public final class JavaTypesGenerator<T> {
075
076    private static final List<TypedGenerator<?>> GENERATORS = new ArrayList<>();
077
078    /**
079     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Boolean}.
080     */
081    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Boolean> BOOLEANS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(booleanObjects(), null);
082
083    /**
084     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for boolean-primitives
085     * with a default value of <code>false</code>.
086     */
087    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Boolean> BOOLEANS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(booleans(),
088            Boolean.FALSE);
089
090    /**
091     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Byte}.
092     */
093    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Byte> BYTES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(byteObjects(), null);
094
095    /**
096     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for byte-primitives with a
097     * default value of <code>0</code>.
098     */
099    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Byte> BYTES_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(bytes(), (byte) 0);
100
101    /**
102     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Character}.
103     */
104    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Character> CHARACTERS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(characterObjects(), null);
105
106    /**
107     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for char-primitives with a
108     * default value of <code>\u0000</code>.
109     */
110    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Character> CHARACTERS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(characters(),
111            '\u0000');
112
113    /**
114     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Class}.
115     */
116    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
117    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Class> CLASS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(classTypes(), null);
118
119    /**
120     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Double}.
121     */
122    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Double> DOUBLES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(doubleObjects(), null);
123
124    /**
125     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for double-primitives with
126     * a default value of <code>0.0d</code>.
127     */
128    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Double> DOUBLES_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(doubles(), 0.0d);
129
130    /**
131     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Float}.
132     */
133    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Float> FLOATS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(floatObjects(), null);
134
135    /**
136     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for float-primitives with
137     * a default value of <code>0.0f</code>.
138     */
139    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Float> FLOATS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(floats(), 0.0f);
140
141    /**
142     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Integer}.
143     */
144    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Integer> INTEGERS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(integerObjects(), null);
145
146    /**
147     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Integer} which
148     * is bound between 1 <= bound <= 31, used for representing days in a month
149     */
150    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Integer> INTEGER_DAYS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(integers(1, 31), null);
151
152    /**
153     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Integer} which
154     * is bound between 1 <= bound <= 12, used for representing months in a year
155     */
156    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Integer> INTEGER_MONTHS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(integers(1, 12), null);
157
158    /**
159     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Integer} which
160     * is bound between 1900 <= bound <= 2100, used for representing years
161     */
162    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Integer> INTEGER_YEARS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(integers(1900, 2100),
163            null);
164
165    /**
166     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for int-primitives with a
167     * default value of <code>0</code>.
168     */
169    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Integer> INTEGERS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(integers(), 0);
170
171    /**
172     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Locale}.
173     */
174    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Locale> LOCALES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(locales(), null);
175
176    /**
177     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Long}.
178     */
179    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Long> LONGS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(longObjects(), null);
180
181    /**
182     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for long-primitives with a
183     * default value of <code>0l</code>.
184     */
185    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Long> LONGS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(longs(), 0L);
186
187    /**
188     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Number}.
189     */
190    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Number> NUMBERS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(numbers(), null);
191
192    /**
193     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for
194     * {@link RuntimeException}. The underlying generator will generate
195     * corresponding exceptions.
196     */
197    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<RuntimeException> RUNTIME_EXCEPTIONS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(
198            runtimeExceptions(), null);
199
200    /**
201     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Serializable}.
202     */
203    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Serializable> SERIALIZABLES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(serializables(),
204            null);
205
206    /**
207     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Short}.
208     */
209    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Short> SHORTS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(shortObjects(), null);
210
211    /**
212     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for short-primitives with
213     * a default value of <code>0</code>.
214     */
215    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Short> SHORTS_PRIMITIVE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(shorts(), (short) 0);
216
217    /**
218     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link String}. The
219     * underlying generator will always create non-empty Strings
220     */
221    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<String> STRINGS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(nonEmptyStrings(), null);
222
223    /**
224     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link String}. The
225     * underlying generator will always letter string in the size ranging from 1-12
226     */
227    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<String> STRINGS_LETTER = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(letterStrings(), null);
228
229    /**
230     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Throwable}. The
231     * underlying generator will generate corresponding exceptions.
232     */
233    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Throwable> THROWABLES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(throwables(), null);
234
235    /**
236     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link TimeZone}.
237     */
238    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<TimeZone> TIME_ZONES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(timeZones(), null);
239
240    /**
241     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link LocalDate}.
242     */
243    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<LocalDate> LOCAL_DATES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(localDates(), null);
244
245    /**
246     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link LocalTime}.
247     */
248    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<LocalTime> LOCAL_TIMES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(localTimes(), null);
249
250    /**
251     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link LocalDateTime}.
252     */
253    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<LocalDateTime> LOCAL_DATE_TIMES = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(localDateTimes(),
254            null);
255
256    /**
257     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Date}.
258     */
259    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Date> DATE = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(dates(), null);
260
261    /**
262     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link Temporal}.
263     */
264    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<Temporal> TEMPORAL = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(temporals(), null);
265
266    /**
267     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link URL}.
268     */
269    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<URL> URLS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(urls(), null);
270
271    /**
272     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link ZoneId}.
273     */
274    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<ZoneId> ZONE_IDS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(zoneIds(), null);
275
276    /**
277     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link ZoneOffset}.
278     */
279    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<ZoneOffset> ZONE_OFFSETS = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(zoneOffsets(), null);
280
281    /**
282     * Creates an instance of of {@link PropertyMetadata} for {@link ZonedDateTime}.
283     */
284    public static final JavaTypesGenerator<ZonedDateTime> ZONED_DATE_TIME = new JavaTypesGenerator<>(zonedDateTimes(),
285            null);
286
287    /** The concrete type of the object created by the generator. */
288    private final Class<T> propertyType;
289
290    /** The actual generator. */
291    private final TypedGenerator<T> generator;
292
293    /**
294     * used for primitive types that have always a default, for all other types this
295     * is <code>null</code>
296     */
297    private final Object defaultValue;
298
299    private JavaTypesGenerator(final TypedGenerator<T> typedGenerator, final Object defaultValue) {
300        propertyType = typedGenerator.getType();
301        generator = typedGenerator;
302        this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
303
304        GENERATORS.add(typedGenerator);
305    }
306
307    /**
308     * @return all {@link TypedGenerator} provided by this class
309     */
310    @SuppressWarnings("squid:S1452") // owolff all generators available, therefore the wildcard is
311                                     // needed
312    public static List<TypedGenerator<?>> allGenerators() {
313        return immutableList(GENERATORS);
314    }
315
316    /**
317     * Creates a configured instance of {@link PropertyMetadata}
318     *
319     * @param name of the property the {@link PropertyMetadata} is related to.
320     * @return {@link PropertyMetadata} with the given name as
321     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getName()}, the corresponding
322     *         {@link TypedGenerator} and
323     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getPropertyClass()}
324     */
325    public PropertyMetadata metadata(final String name) {
326        return metadataBuilder(name).build();
327    }
328
329    /**
330     * Creates a configured instance of {@link PropertyMetadata} with the required
331     * attribute set to <code>true</code> -> Property is required
332     *
333     * @param name of the property the {@link PropertyMetadata} is related to.
334     * @return {@link PropertyMetadata} with the given name as
335     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getName()}, the corresponding
336     *         {@link TypedGenerator} and
337     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getPropertyClass()}
338     */
339    public PropertyMetadata metadataRequired(final String name) {
340        return metadataBuilder(name).required(true).build();
341    }
342
343    /**
344     * Creates a configured instance of {@link PropertyMetadata} with the required
345     * attribute set to <code>true</code> -> Property is required and the variant
346     * that the content is to be be used as collectionGenerator.
347     *
348     * @param name           of the property the {@link PropertyMetadata} is related
349     *                       to.
350     * @param collectionType to be set to the
351     *                       {@link PropertyMetadataBuilder#collectionType(CollectionType)}
352     * @return {@link PropertyMetadata} with the given name as
353     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getName()}, the corresponding
354     *         {@link TypedGenerator} and
355     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getPropertyClass()}
356     */
357    public PropertyMetadata metadataRequired(final String name, final CollectionType collectionType) {
358        return metadataBuilder(name).required(true).collectionType(collectionType).build();
359    }
360
361    /**
362     * Creates a configured instance of {@link PropertyMetadata} with the variant
363     * that the content is to be be used as collectionGenerator.
364     *
365     * @param name           of the property the {@link PropertyMetadata} is related
366     *                       to.
367     * @param collectionType to be set to the
368     *                       {@link PropertyMetadataBuilder#collectionType(CollectionType)}
369     * @return {@link PropertyMetadata} with the given name as
370     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getName()}, the corresponding
371     *         {@link TypedGenerator} and
372     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getPropertyClass()}
373     */
374    public PropertyMetadata metadata(final String name, final CollectionType collectionType) {
375        return metadataBuilder(name).collectionType(collectionType).build();
376    }
377
378    /**
379     * Creates pre-configured instances of {@link PropertyMetadataBuilder}
380     *
381     * @param name of the property the {@link PropertyMetadata} is related to.
382     * @return {@link PropertyMetadataBuilder} with the given name as
383     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getName()}, the corresponding
384     *         {@link TypedGenerator} and
385     *         {@link PropertyMetadata#getPropertyClass()}
386     */
387    public PropertyMetadataBuilder metadataBuilder(final String name) {
388        checkArgument(!nullToEmpty(name).isEmpty(), "name must not be null nor empty");
389        return PropertyMetadataImpl.builder().name(name).generator(generator).defaultValue(defaultValue != null)
390                .propertyClass(propertyType);
391    }
392
393}
